entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , New Tecumseth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.2°C

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning and ending near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 then west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High zero with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
